title: Github Repository Text Searcher
description: Easily find specific lines of code within a public github repository.

title: Download Speed Calculator
description: Easily calculate how long it takes to download a file! Simply input the file size and your download speed, and the tool will tell you the estimated download time.

title: File & Text Comparer
description: Easily compare two files or text inputs to identify differences. This tool highlights modifications with clear visual markers.
